episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0100:
Our beachside pop-up, Dine-A-Max, is open
for business!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0200:
Mallow, we have two orders... One Z-Set and
one curry, please.
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0300:
Thanks for stopping by! I’ll whip those up in
no time!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0400: Hmm... What do you recommend I try?
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0600:
We’ve got just the thing for you! Why don’t you try
our order roulette?
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0800:
I’m glad you asked! My Inteleon, which traveled
around Galar with me, is a crack-shot sniper
with Water Gun!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_0900:
This order roulette is a brand-new way of
ordering food that showcases his talents!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_1000:
We’ll spin the roulette wheel and have Inteleon
take a shot at it to place your order!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_1100:
Each section of the wheel is a different menu item!
We’ve got Z-Sets, curry, Rage Candy Bars...
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_1200:
And last but not least, “On the House”! Hit that
spot, and you’ll get any menu item you choose
for free!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_1400:
Inteleon is gonna keep his aim steady on a set
point. All you have to do is let him know when
you want him to shoot!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_1500: OK! I’ll give it a try!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_0401_1800:
Here goes the roulette!
Give us the signal!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_0402_2000: And off it spins! Give us the signal!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_2400: Wonderful! Then...I’ll have a Z-Set, please!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_2500: Gloria’s amazin’. I’ve gotta step up my game.
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_2600:
She’s made good use of Inteleon’s best skills...
So maybe Grimmsnarl and I can do the same!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_2800: Huh? Oh, sure. What would ya like?
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_2900: Waaah! Waaah! You’re both so scary!
episode_event_summer_2021/4001_1001_3300:
It’s OK! Marnie, could you help out over there for
a bit? I’ll take care of this kid!
episode_event_summer_2021/4002_1001_0100:
Good work, everyone! Dine-A-Max had so many
customers today!
episode_event_summer_2021/4002_1001_0200:
Let’s keep up the pace and get even more
customers tomorrow!
episode_event_summer_2021/4002_1001_0400:
Sorry, I’m knackered. I’m gonna head home for
the day...
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_0200:
Why can’t I smile right? I’ve gotta do better
than this!
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_0500:
Yeah. I wanna learn how to smile like Gloria,
though I know it’s silly to try at this point...
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_0600:
I wouldn’t think that at all! Look at how hard
you’re working!
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_0700:
That little girl who cried earlier today was just a
little startled—that’s all.
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_0900:
But I think it’s important to smile if you’re workin’
in front of customers!
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1000: You’re such a hard worker, Marnie.
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1100:
I’m not good at expressing myself, either. So I
think I understand how you feel.
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1200:
Hey, Marley? What made you decide to help us
run Dine-A-Max?
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1300:
Well... I figured it’d be more fun to give it a try
rather than just turn it down because I’m not good
at it.
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1400: Huh, I guess that’s the same as me.
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1500: Would you mind if...if I practiced smiling with you?
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1600:
Please do! Can I ask ya for some advice while
you’re here?
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1700: *chuckle* Sure. I’ll do what I can!
episode_event_summer_2021/4003_1001_1800:
What was that? Sounded like it was comin’ from
our pop-up!
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0200: Hey, cut it out! Why are ya doin’ this?
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0400:
None of your business! Machamp, keep
breaking that!
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0600: I’ll ask ya again: Why are ya doin’ this?
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0700: W-we were trying to reform ourselves!
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0800:
We worked really hard to build a beachside
pop-up, all on our own!
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_0900:
But then you all came along and stole all of our
customers...
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_1000:
I mean...we know it’s not right...but with our sales
dropping so much, we didn’t know what else
to do...
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_1100:
I’m sorry! If you’re gonna punish someone for this,
punish me! It was my idea, not hers!
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_1200:
Marnie...these people are feeling bad for what
they did.
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_1300:
Yeah, I know. I can tell, ’cause I know some
people who’re just like ’em...
episode_event_summer_2021/4004_1001_1500: I’ve got an idea for how I can help ya.
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0100: Marnie and Marley are late today...
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0300:
Good morning! There’s a lot we need you
to prep...
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0400: Sorry! We’ve got some new plans, actually...
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0500:
Starting today, Marley and I are gonna be helpin’
out Team Break with their pop-up!
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0700: I’ve found somethin’ that I wanna do.
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0800: What’s up with you all of a sudden? Why are y—
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_0900:
It’s OK, Mallow! I’m sure Marnie has a good
reason.
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1100:
Sorry, Mallow. It’s not that I dislike workin’ here
at Dine-A-Max or anythin’...
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1200:
It’s just...I wanna compete with Gloria on my
own terms!
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1300:
Course, that’s not the only reason. But it is true
that I wanna challenge you!
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1400: From this point on, we’re rivals!
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1500:
We’re gonna have a proper showdown, and I’m
not holdin’ back!
episode_event_summer_2021/4005_1001_1600:
Yeah, I understand! It’s a challenge! And I don’t
plan on losing!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0100: I see... So all that happened last night, huh?
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0200: I get her reason for leaving us, but...
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0300:
I don’t think helping out a rival eatery is the right
solution here.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0400:
If you’re running a business, there’s always
going to be some competition to get customers.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0500:
But if you stop to help every single store that runs
into problems along the way, you might get run
out of business yourself!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0600:
And even if that Team Break pop-up gets its
customers back, that’s just temporary. It might not
last forever!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0700: I know what you mean, Mallow.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_0800: But I think I understand Marnie’s feelings, too.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_0401_1000:
Because we’re both from Galar...and we’re each
other’s rival!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_0402_1200:
Yup! We’re both from Galar, and we’re each
other’s rival!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1300:
That’s why I think I understand where she’s
coming from.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1400:
I know that those Team Break members were
doing something wrong.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1500:
But I think they really were doing their best to
make their pop-up succeed!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1600:
I bet that reminded Marnie of the people back
in Spikemuth.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1700:
She loves them a lot, and they’re quite similar to
Team Break, if you think about it! So of course
she would offer to help them out!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1800: I love how kind she is!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_1900:
*sigh* I’d say you’re pretty kind, too, for letting
her leave us like that.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_2000: Oh well! Guess we just have to carry on, then!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_2100: We’ll have to do our very best on our end, too!
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_2200: I’ll see you later. I have to join Marnie now.
episode_event_summer_2021/4006_1001_2400: Could you pass on a message to Marnie for me?
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0100:
Welcome, welcome! We’ve got some tasty
Z-Noodles for you to slurp right up!
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0300: Boss, your smile looks kinda stiff...
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0500:
I-it’s OK! You’re still charming just as you
are now!
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0700: *sigh* Why can’t I do it right...
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0800:
I was so confident, and I even declared that we
were rivals and left the other pop-up...
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_0900: But I still can’t make a single good smile...
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1000: No—I have to! Otherwise, I can’t face Gloria!
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1200:
“You can find other ways to get more customers.
Ways that are better suited for you!”
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1300: Gloria told me to tell you that.
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1400:
Gloria? Even though I’m the one who
challenged her?
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1500: I think that’s exactly why she’s telling you this.
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1600:
She also wants to compete with everything she’s
got. That’s why she’s giving you this advice.
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1700: You two really are great rivals for each other.
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1800:
Thanks, Marley. I think Gloria would be
happy to hear that, too.
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_1900:
I was wondering... Is there anything that makes
you smile naturally?
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_2100: Oi! Is your Machamp doin’ anythin’ right now?
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_2200:
Nope. No customers are here yet, so he’s just
loafing around. What’re you thinking?
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_2300:
Isn’t it obvious? I’ve thought of somethin’ that’s
sure to bring in loads of customers!
episode_event_summer_2021/4007_1001_2500:
Well, obviously I mean that we’re gonna show
everyone some intense Pokémon battles!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! This batch of Rage
Candy Bars is ready!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_0401_0300:
Ah, this is what I was waiting for! These candy
bars are all the rage!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_0302_0400: Here are your Rage Candy Bars!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_0402_0500: Yeah, these look wild! I can’t wait to eat ’em!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_0600:
Thank you very much! Next customer, please!
...Wait, huh?
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_0700: What happened to all the people that were here?
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_0800: Gloria, take a look over there!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_0900:
The battle’s only just begun! Behold this sea of
muscular power!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1000:
Grimmsnarl! Once you evade that, we’re goin’ in
for a counterattack!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1300: Whoa! Marnie’s smile is so cute!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1400:
That calls for a toast! Get me one of those new
juices, please!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1500: Could I get an order of Z-Noodles?
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1600:
Oh, I see! They’re selling food and drinks to
people who came to watch their Pokémon battles!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1800:
Yeah, it’s perfect! Marnie’s smiles and battles
are both looking great!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_1900:
We should get back to work so we don’t
fall behind!
episode_event_summer_2021/4008_1001_2000:
Inteleon! Mallow! We’ve gotta work even harder
to make this pop-up a success and beat Marnie!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0100: Thank you so much for helping us, boss!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0200:
Thanks to all your help, I think we’ll be OK on
our own now!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0300:
We still have a lot to work on, but we promise
to do it the right way from now on!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0400: Yeah... That’s how it should be.
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0500: I know you can do it! Good luck!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0700: Hey, Marnie! You did great today!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_0900:
That idea you had to set up a Pokémon battle
viewing area was great!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1100: I only thought of it ’cause of your advice, Gloria.
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1200:
Y’know how everyone in Galar loves to watch
a proper match between Dynamax Pokémon?
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1300:
My big bro and I have always tried to show
everyone that even if ya can’t Dynamax, ya can
still have really amazin’ battles.
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1400:
I remembered that...an’ it inspired me to set that
all up!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1500:
Are you going to help them out
again tomorrow?
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1600: No, I think they’ll be fine on their own now.
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1700:
Tomorrow, I want to work with you again, an’
we’re gonna get everyone excited about
our pop-up!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_1800:
But don’t you worry—I’ll make sure to bring in as
many customers as you do!
episode_event_summer_2021/4009_1001_2000:
We’ve come here all the way from Galar, after
all! Let’s have some fun and make tons of
memories this summer!
